example_request_story.idea: A superhero saves the city from an alien invasion

custom_character_roster.name: Captain Thunder

physical_appearance.hair_style: short military cut with slight wave on top
physical_appearance.facial_features: chiseled jawline, strong cheekbones, straight nose, determined expression
physical_appearance.distinctive_marks: lightning bolt scar on right temple

clothing_style.primary_outfit: blue and silver superhero suit with lightning bolt emblem on chest, red cape, silver boots
clothing_style.clothing_style: superhero costume with modern tactical elements

custom_character_roster.personality: brave, selfless, natural leader, protective of innocents, quick decision maker

voice_mannerisms.accent_or_tone: deep resonant voice with American accent
voice_mannerisms.typical_expressions: determined gaze, confident stance, reassuring smile to civilians

custom_character_roster.video_prompt_description: A 32-year-old muscular athletic male superhero standing 6'2" tall with warm bronze tan skin. He has jet black hair with blue undertones in a short military cut with slight wave on top, electric blue eyes with silver flecks in intense almond-shaped eyes, chiseled jawline, strong cheekbones, straight nose, and a lightning bolt scar on right temple. Wearing a blue and silver superhero suit with lightning bolt emblem on chest, red cape flowing behind, silver boots, silver utility belt, and communication earpiece. Standing in heroic pose with determined expression and confident stance.

custom_character_roster.name: Spark

physical_appearance.hair_style: shoulder-length with side-swept bangs, often in motion
physical_appearance.facial_features: heart-shaped face, small upturned nose, full lips, youthful appearance
physical_appearance.distinctive_marks: small star-shaped birthmark on left cheek

clothing_style.primary_outfit: orange and yellow bodysuit with lightning patterns, white gloves, orange boots
clothing_style.clothing_style: sleek modern superhero suit with energy motifs
clothing_style.accessories: energy gauntlets on wrists, utility pouches on belt

custom_character_roster.personality: energetic, optimistic, tech-savvy, loyal, quick-witted, enthusiastic

voice_mannerisms.speaking_style: fast-paced and enthusiastic with occasional tech jargon
voice_mannerisms.accent_or_tone: upbeat youthful voice with slight valley accent
voice_mannerisms.typical_expressions: bright smile, animated gestures, excited expressions when using tech

custom_character_roster.video_prompt_description: A 24-year-old lean athletic female superhero standing 5'7" tall with fair skin and warm undertones. She has bright red hair with orange highlights in shoulder-length style with side-swept bangs, large expressive amber gold round eyes, heart-shaped face, small upturned nose, full lips, and a small star-shaped birthmark on left cheek. Wearing orange and yellow bodysuit with lightning patterns, white gloves, orange boots, energy gauntlets on wrists, and utility pouches on belt. Energetic pose with bright smile and animated expression.

example_request_meme.idea: When you finally understand the homework 5 minutes before class

custom_character_roster.name: Jake

physical_appearance.facial_features: round face, average features, often looks stressed
physical_appearance.distinctive_marks: dark circles under eyes from late-night studying

clothing_style.accessories: backpack, coffee cup always in hand

custom_character_roster.personality: procrastinator, relatable, stressed but trying, comedic timing

voice_mannerisms.typical_expressions: panic face, sudden realization, relief expressions

custom_character_roster.video_prompt_description: A 19-year-old average build male college student standing 5'9" tall with light olive skin. He has messy dark brown bedhead hair in medium length, tired-looking dark brown round eyes with dark circles underneath, round face with average features and stressed expression. Wearing wrinkled gray college hoodie, blue jeans, sneakers, carrying backpack, and holding coffee cup. Typical stressed college student posture with relatable panic expressions.

example_request_free_content.idea: 5 morning habits that changed my life

custom_character_roster.name: Sarah Wellness

physical_appearance.hair_style: long wavy hair, usually in neat ponytail
physical_appearance.facial_features: oval face, warm smile, approachable appearance

clothing_style.primary_outfit: white athletic tank top, mint green yoga pants, white sneakers
clothing_style.accessories: fitness watch, water bottle, yoga mat

voice_mannerisms.accent_or_tone: warm friendly voice with professional clarity
voice_mannerisms.typical_expressions: genuine smile, encouraging nods, demonstrative gestures

custom_character_roster.video_prompt_description: A 29-year-old fit and toned female wellness host standing 5'6" tall with warm honey beige skin. She has long wavy chestnut brown hair with caramel highlights in a neat ponytail, warm hazel friendly almond-shaped eyes, oval face with warm smile and dimples. Wearing white athletic tank top, mint green yoga pants, white sneakers, fitness watch on wrist, holding water bottle with yoga mat nearby. Approachable posture with genuine encouraging smile and professional demeanor.
